name: Nothing Hurts {Demo}
description:
This is Nothing Hurt, a relatively short demo I made for my end of year project.

'You' exist in a world that was once victim to an apocalyptic event where you move through a house trying to piece together the events of the past, and how you may or may not fit into all of it.
There's a fair amount of text to be read written by many ghosts who seemed to have used this house as a shelter at some point. I took a lot of inspiration from books that I've enjoyed, writers that have moved me and my biggest aim for this project was to maybe move, however tiny the distance, someone else.

Solo building this project from the ground up taught me an incredible amount and I hope to one day return to this piece to fix all the flaws and build upon it even more.

Thank you for checking it out
